entities.name: waving hello
entities.description: A friendly wave to acknowledge presence or greet someone.

entities.name: intimacy
entities.description: Intimacy refers to a deep emotional and physical connection between individuals.

entities.name: Attentiveness
entities.description: Attentiveness is the state of being attentive and focused on a task or interaction.

entities.name: CONFLICT RESOLUTION
entities.description: Body language can play a role in resolving conflicts by improving communication and understanding

entities.name: disinterest
entities.description: Disinterest is the state of not being interested or engaged.

entities.name: Professional Settings
entities.description: Professional settings include workplaces, business meetings, and other formal environments.

entities.name: frowns
entities.description: Frowns are facial expressions characterized by a downward turn of the mouth, often indicating negative emotions such as sadness, displeasure, or disapproval.

entities.name: Mirroring Posture
entities.description: Mirroring another person"s posture can help to establish rapport and create a sense of connection.

entities.name: Communication Clarity
entities.description: Clarity in communication refers to the ability to convey messages clearly and effectively, ensuring that the intended meaning is understood by the recipient.

entities.name: social navigation
entities.description: Social navigation refers to the ability to navigate social situations effectively and with ease.

entities.name: Dishonesty
entities.description: Dishonesty is the act of being untruthful or deceitful.

entities.name: nodding
entities.description: Nodding is an affirmative gesture indicating agreement or understanding.

entities.name: attraction
entities.description: Attraction refers to the feeling of being drawn towards someone, often accompanied by positive emotions and interest.

entities.name: communication
entities.description: Communication through body language and gestures.

entities.name: BODY LANGUAGE
entities.description: A form of expression using body movements and gestures.

entities.name: Sadness
entities.description: Sadness is a feeling of unhappiness or sorrow.

entities.name: Discomfort
entities.description: Discomfort is a feeling of unease or dissatisfaction.

entities.name: leaning in
entities.description: A physical action where one leans towards another person during conversation, indicating interest and engagement.

entities.name: touching
entities.description: Touching involves physical contact between individuals as an expression of attraction and intimacy.

entities.name: POSTURE
entities.description: Posture is a form of body language that can reveal a person's thoughts and feelings

entities.name: Positive Interactions
entities.description: Positive interactions refer to exchanges between individuals that are characterized by mutual respect, understanding, and positive emotions.

entities.name: CONFIDENCE
entities.description: Confidence is a quality that can be projected through body language, such as maintaining good posture and making direct eye contact

entities.name: EYE CONTACT
entities.description: Maintaining eye contact is a form of body language that can signal attentiveness and engagement

entities.name: Attraction and Intimacy
entities.description: Feelings of romantic interest and closeness between individuals.

entities.name: standing up straight
entities.description: An upright and confident body position.

entities.name: assertiveness
entities.description: Assertiveness is the quality of being self-assured and confident without being aggressive.
A percentage value often cited in research studies to estimate the proportion of communication conveyed through body language.

entities.name: Personal Cues
entities.description: Signals or indicators that are specific to an individual"s personal preferences or behaviors.

entities.name: meaningful
entities.description: Exchanging ideas and emotions effectively between individuals.

entities.name: thumbs up
entities.description: A gesture indicating agreement or approval.

entities.name: stronger relationships
entities.description: Enhanced bond or link between individuals

entities.name: fulfilling
entities.description: Resulting in contentment and satisfaction from interactions.

entities.name: Intentions
entities.description: Intentions are the goals or plans that individuals have in mind.

entities.name: conflicts
entities.description: The process of addressing and resolving disagreements or disputes between individuals.

entities.name: connections
entities.description: The establishment and strengthening of relationships through social exchanges.

entities.name: authority
entities.description: Authority refers to the power or right to give orders, make decisions, and enforce obedience. In the context of body language, authority can be projected through specific gestures and postures.

attributes.Projection Method: Maintaining good posture and making direct eye contact

entities.name: Concern
entities.description: A feeling of worry or anxiety about a situation or problem.

entities.name: slouching
entities.description: Slouching refers to an informal posture where one's shoulders are rounded forward and away from the back, often indicating lack of confidence or disinterest.

entities.name: crossing one's arms
entities.description: A defensive or uncomfortable stance

entities.name: establishing
entities.description: Creating a connection or link

entities.name: mirroring
entities.description: Repeating another person's actions to foster connection and understanding.

entities.name: RELATIONSHIP BUILDING
entities.description: Body language can help build stronger relationships by enhancing communication and connection

entities.name: Displeasure
entities.description: Displeasure is a feeling of dissatisfaction or annoyance.

entities.name: shoulders back
entities.description: Carrying one's shoulders in an upright position

entities.name: conveying
entities.description: Transmitting emotions and intentions without using words.

entities.name: gazing
entities.description: Gazing involves prolonged eye contact as a form of communication indicating interest or affection.

entities.name: Disapproval
entities.description: Disapproval is the act of not approving or agreeing with something.
